model.dataType
Class AccountData

java.lang.Object
  model.dataType.AccountData

public class AccountData
extends Object

Holds username, password, and account type. Info is used in user profiles and guest accounts for log-in purposes.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs for the basic required information: server, userID, and password.

addFriend

public boolean addFriend(UserData friend)
Adds a friend by UserData. Will not add duplicate entries, checked by userID.

Parameters:
friend -
Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise. May return false due to a duplciate friend.
